name: T-64B
description: Main battle tank produced by the Soviet Union.

name: T-64BV
description: Improved version of the T-64B with additional armor and upgrades to the fire control system.

name: T-64BV 2017
description: Modernized version of the T-64BV with improved armor and new fire control system.

name: T-64BV 2022
description: Latest upgrade of the T-64BV with improved engines and digital systems.

name: T-64BM "Bulat"
description: Modernized version of the T-64B with upgraded armor, new fire control system and improved engines.

name: T-64BM2
description: Further upgrade of the T-64BM with additional armor and new electronic systems.

name: T-72AMT
description: Improved version of the T-72 with additional armor and new fire control system.

name: T-80BV
description: Main battle tank with advanced fire control system and composite armor.

name: T-84
description: Main battle tank with composite armor and advanced fire control system.

name: T-84U
description: Improved version of the T-84 with new fire control system and engine.

name: T-84U “Oplot-M”
description: Further upgrade of the T-84U with additional armor and new fire control system.

name: BM Oplot
description: New generation main battle tank with advanced armor and electronic systems.
